childnodes.sy: Cheer yourself up with a spot of tea and cake at Camellia’s. The menu is extensive,  and we recommend you try the antioxidant-rich white tea and decadent orange cake.You’ll want to stay all day, so linger in the tea shop, where you can purchase all t
Sip champagne and enjoy an afternoon tea of beautiful scones and delicate pastries in the beautiful lobby of the Landmark. It’s the perfect place to take your mum.
Get your savory and your sweet with the beautiful and stylish dishes at Sketch. Don’t leave without checking out the trippy multicolor-lighted bathrooms.
Go hybrid at Bea's Of Bloomsbury. The famous cafe is known for it's afternoon teas, townies & duffins. #cake #bloomsbury #tea #h
The cakes at Konditor & Cook are legendary. The perfect place to order your cake from for a big birthday or wedding #cake #lunch

Champagne tastes on a lemonade budget? Get an hour of luxury for less at Harrod’s; the food court is home to the most beautiful café, Galvin Demoiselle, where you can easily while away an hour or two enjoying a deluxe hot chocolate.
Perfect sweet pick me ups at cakery extraordinaire Hummingbird Bakery.
